table.name: invoice_refnum
table.description: Can be used to store qualified reference information about an invoice.  The qualifier/description of the information is stored in the table INVOICE_REFNUM_QUAL. Example of a reference qualifier would be BILL OF LADING.

columns.name: INVOICE_REFNUM_QUAL_GID
columns.description: The GID for the reference number (PONUMBER, VATNUMBER, CUSTPONUMBER).

columns.name: INVOICE_REFNUM_VALUE
columns.description: Value of entered for the Reference Number Qualifier.

columns.name: ISSUE_DATE
columns.description: The date the invoice was issued.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
